attributes.action: IF MP's FORCE THROUGH A SECOND REFERENDUM, I WILL NOT VOTE IN THE NEXT ELECTION.
attributes.additional_details: IF MP's DO NOT CARRY OUT THE WILL OF THE PEOPLE WHO ELECT THEM, DEMOCRACY IS DAMAGED SO MUCH SO THAT PEOPLE WILL GIVE UP VOTING IN FUTURE GENERAL ELECTIONS.
attributes.background: WE HAD A DEMOCRATIC VOTE ON BREXIT, IF ANOTHER ONE IS FORCED THROUGH AGAINST THIS RESULT THEN DEMOCRACY IS DEAD.
